item.title: In the end it's all about the people
item.description: I really like this article Iâ€™ve read in Increment The epistemology of software quality Say you run a new team. You have carte blanche to implement any policies you want to make the team more productive and the code less buggy. What do you do? You could choose a new programming language, or switch everything to microservices, or follow the hottest trend in process. Or you could do things that matter.
